title: S&t Bancorp Inc (STBA) Files Form 4 Insider Selling : James Thomas Gibson ...
text:
Stephanie Nicolas July 24, 2015 
S&t Bancorp Inc (STBA): James Thomas Gibson , director of S&t Bancorp Inc sold 75,000 shares on Jul 22, 2015. The Insider selling transaction was disclosed on Jul 24, 2015 to the Securities and Exchange Commission. The shares were sold at $32.26 per share for a total value of $2,440,795.00. 
On a different note, The Company has disclosed insider buying and selling activities to the Securities Exchange, Antolik David G, Officer (SR EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT) of S&T Bancorp Inc, executed a transaction worth $28,004 on April 24, 2015. A total of 1,015 shares were purchased at an average price of $27.59. The Insider information was divulged by the Securities and Exchange Commission in a Form 4 filing. The information is based on open market trades at the market prices.Option exercises are not covered. Currently the company Insiders own 3.3% of S&T Bancorp Inc. Company shares. In the past six months, there is a change of -4.61% in the total insider ownership. Institutional Investors own 46.2% of Company shares. During last 3 month period, 0.06% of total institutional ownership has changed in the company shares. 
Company has received recommendation from many analysts. Raymond James downgrades its rating on S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA). Analysts at the Raymond James have a current rating of Market Perform on the shares. The shares were previously rated Outperform. The rating by the firm was issued on March 30, 2015. S&T Bancorp Inc. is up 10.25% in the last 3-month period. Year-to-Date the stock performance stands at 5.33%.‚Äù
